description.p: Increase your dexterity by 1, to a maximum of 20.
The sling is a tricky weapon to use, but you have spent countless hours mastering it. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls you make with the weapon.
Your hours of experience with a sling allow you to fire stones with greater force than most. Your damage for a sling increases to 2d4. Additionally, slings have their normal and long ranged doubled.

sheet.description: When using a sling, you gain +1 to attack rolls with that weapon. Your hours of experience with a sling allow you to fire stones with greater force than most. Your damage for a sling increases to 2d4. Additionally, slings have their normal and long ranged doubled.

description.p: As a bonus action, if you have access to the extra attack feature, you may make an additional attack with your off-hand weapon for every additional attack you would be able to make with your attack action.
When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

sheet.description: If you have access to the extra attack feature, you may make an additional attack for each attack you could make with your attack action. When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.
